articles.content: The No. T20 batter in the world, Suryakumar Yadav, hasn't found the key to success in ODI cricket yet. He incurred three golden ducks in the 50-over assignment against Australia, triggering a plethor… [+1963 chars]

articles.title: Jasprit Bumrah's Recovery Will Be Secret; Only VVS Laxman To Track Details: Report - News18
articles.description: Jasprit Bumrah was tried to be brought back into the scheme of things in a hurried manner twice before - just before the ICC World T20 last year and then again before the ODIs against Sri Lanka this year
